# Creating and Manipulating Time Series

## `ts` Class


## Missing Values

```{r}
d <- c('2001-01-01', '2001-01-02', '2001-01-04', '2001-01-05')
d <- as.Date(d)
date_range <- seq(min(d), max(d), by = 1) 
date_range[!date_range %in% d] 
```
